content: ज्योतिष्मत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [ज्योतिरस्त्यस्य मतुप्] {@--1@} Luminous, bright, shining, possessed of luminous bodies; नक्षत्रताराग्रहसंकुलापि ज्योतिष्मती चंद्रमसैव रात्रिः <ls>R. 6. 22.</ls> {@--2@} Celestial. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} The sun. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the third foot of Brahmā. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the seven suns appearing at the destruction of the world. --ती {@--1@} The night (as illuminated by the stars). {@--2@} (In <ab>phil.</ab>) A state of mind pervaded by सत्त्वगुण {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} a tranquil state of mind.
